titles.title: To extend for 1 year the availability of supplemental social services block grant funding.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Income Security and Family Support.

bill.summary:
1/4/2007--Introduced.
Extends through FY2008 the availability of certain supplemental social services block grant funding under title XX (Block Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act.
